title: Person
description: Abstract class for inheritance by the Insider and Accomplice objects. Describes the properties of an individual that MAY be inherited by those classes.

first_name.description: The first, or given, name of the individual.

middle_name.description: The middle name of the individual.

last_name.description: The last, or family, name of the individual.

suffix.description: The name suffix of the individual.

alias.description: A list of aliases (other names) the individual has used, and/or the anonymized of the individual in court records.

city.description: The city (or county/district) that the person resided in at the time of the incident.

state.description: The state (or region) that the person resided in at the time of the incident.

country.description: The country that the person resided in at the time of the incident.

postal_code.description: The postal code that the person resided in at the time of the incident.

country_of_citizenship.description: Citizenship of the insider (if known). Generally, US Citizenship can be assumed unless court or media reports specify otherwise (e.g., US (Chinese National) or Canadian). US citizens will typically have a SSN that may be referenced in court documents. If an insider is a foreign national, this may be mentioned in media reports related to the incident.

nationality.description: The nationality or nationalities of the person, enter all that apply.

residency.description: If the insider is not a born US citizen, but resides in the United States, the court documents and/or media reports will usually list the residency status (i.e. naturalized, permanent resident, or resident alien).

gender.description: Sex of the insider (if known) at the time of the incident. Do not make assumptions (e.g., male, female, unknown) about the insider’s sex.

age.description: Age of insider at the time that the incident began (e.g., 25).

education.description: Highest level of education, only input if specifically stated. This information may be stated within court documents or available on insider’s social media profiles.

marital_status.description: The marital status of the insider at the time of the incident (Single, Married, Divorced, Separated, Widowed, Unknown).

number_of_children.description: The number of children that the insider is responsible for, at the time of the incident.
